channel.title: Окружающий Мир on Rusland 1

item.title: Окружающий Мир – Dance with Me (Танцуй Со Мной)
item.description: Lyrics available on Lyricstranslate and in the second video below. Minor corrections have been made in the lyrics at the bottom. Танцуй со мной (Dance with Me) Slow cigarette smoke Spreads everywhere And I’m walking my girlfriend home We drank all night Danced all evening We just wanted To feel lighter together.
